Transmogrified to:
Hood of Violet Rebirth

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Ice Lance damage increased by 8%.
Set: Damage dealt by Fingers of Frost enhanced Ice Lances invoke a Frigid Pulse, dealing 24,305 Frost damage to nearby targets. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Jeweled Gauntlets of Violet Rebirth

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities apply Ratfang Toxin to your target, stacking up to 5 times.
Use: Release all toxin stacks to deal 776,744 Nature damage, plus 88,771 per stack over 5 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 297,757 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ward of Violet Rebirth

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
